attributes.contentHtml:
ยง 184 Defamation
(1) Whoever communicates false information about another person, which is capable of significantly endangering his or her seriousness with fellow citizens, especially damaging him in employment, disrupting his family relations or causing him other serious harm, shall be punished by imprisonment for up to one year.

(2) An offender shall be punished by imprisonment for up to two years or a ban on activity if he commits the act referred to in paragraph 1 by printing, film, radio, television, a publicly accessible computer network or other similarly effective means.

attributes.title: gamerhost.pro | Nulled WHMCS & No ToS and PP
